Name: 亡命尸潮惊魂夜 Escape Zombies At Night
About the game: This is a doomsday survival escape game. The terror of the night zombie crisis broke out, walking corpses all over the city, we have to find a way to escape Players need to search for necessary survival materials and weapons in cities full of zombies. But food and water will always run out, in the end, in order to escape the city which is already a corpse tide. Escape the night of terror alive
